p: Mean annual precipitation is 75cm and mean annual temperature is 17.8°C. Soils at the site are fine-loamy, mixed, superactive Ultic Haploxeralfs and fine, mixed, superactive Typic Rhodoxeralfs. Soil pH ranges between 5.7 and 6.2. The experiment is located in an annual grassland system that is irregularly interrupted by small patches of winter-deciduous blue oak ( Quercus douglasii), and evergreen interior live oak ( Q. wislizeni) that provide approximately 40% shade. The area has experienced seasonal low intensity grazing by livestock since the 1960’s.
